name: Ext_R4_SubstanceSpecification
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.SubstanceSpecification for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceSpecification from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceSpecification|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceSpecification from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceSpecification|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: High level categorization, e.g. polymer or nucleic acid
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceSpecification.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceSpecification|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: High level categorization, e.g. polymer or nucleic acid
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceSpecification.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceSpecification|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Status of substance within the catalogue e.g. approved
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceSpecification.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceSpecification|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Status of substance within the catalogue e.g. approved
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceSpecification.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceSpecification|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: If the substance applies to only human or veterinary use
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents SubstanceSpecification.domain from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceSpecification|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: If the substance applies to only human or veterinary use
